meanings.definition: A person who readily or frequently enters into casual sexual relationships with women.
meanings.sent1: The philanderers at the bar were always surrounded by women.
meanings.sent2: He was known as one of the biggest philanderers in town.
meanings.sent3: The group of philanderers joked about their latest conquests over drinks.
meanings.sent4: His reputation as a philanderer spread like wildfire through the small town.
meanings.sent5: The image of the philanderers chasing after women was hard to forget.

meanings.definition: A man who engages in flirtatious behavior with multiple women.
meanings.sent1: The charming philanderers at the party had all the ladies laughing.
meanings.sent2: He was often labeled as a philanderer due to his playful nature with women.
meanings.sent3: The philanderers' smooth talk and compliments made the women blush.
meanings.sent4: In the world of love, he was a true artist, a master philanderer.
meanings.sent5: The philanderers' antics were both entertaining and exhausting to witness.

meanings.definition: Someone who is unfaithful in romantic relationships.
meanings.sent1: The philanderers' deceitful ways eventually caught up with them.
meanings.sent2: She never expected her partner to turn into a philanderer.
meanings.sent3: The philanderers' web of lies unraveled when their secrets were exposed.
meanings.sent4: His heart was like a revolving door, always open to new philanderers.
meanings.sent5: The pain of being betrayed by a philanderer cut deep into her heart.
